about_the_game:
In Reconciliation, a psychological horror game, you will play as a young high schooler. The last few months have been rough you've been outcast at your school even by your best friend. Your best friend offers to rekindle the friendship through a startling test of courage. With nothing but a camera and a flashlight will you survive the puzzles and challenges that await you and rekindle your friendship or will you die trying.

Traverse the darkness of the night with your flashlight, and find other items to unlock doors of mystery and eventually escape your doom.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Additional Notes: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers. For development: IL2CPP scripting backend requires Visual Studio 2015 with C++ Tools component or later and Windows 10+ SDK.

short_description: Psychological horror where you play as a young high schooler seeking reconciliation with an old friend. Unfortunately it won't be so easy, a perilous journey awaits you before you'll be able to reunite as friends once again.
